name: Jessy TheHairstylist
bio: My name is Jessy! I am extremely passionate about HAIR and being a HAIRSTYLIST. Being able to meet new people and make them feel great through their hair makes me look forward to what I hope to be a great, big career filled with many great experiences. I will be posting pictures of my work, please feel free to comment. If you are interested in an appointment or have any questions please feel free to contact me.  Also, if you like my work suggest me to your friends and family. I appreciate all of you who are so supportive with my hairstyling career. <3<3<3
quotes:
"without passion, life has no meaning...." 
"Nothing in life is to be feared, only to be understood."
